scripts.psql: docker exec -it postgres psql -d nestjs -U admin
scripts.precommit: concurrently "npm audit --production" "npm run test:server" "npm run test:web"
scripts.test:server: cd ./server && npm install --no-audit && npm run lint && npm run test && npm audit --audit-level=critical --production
scripts.test:web: cd ./web && npm install --no-audit && npm run lint && CI=true npm run test && npm audit --audit-level=critical --production
